text: :  . ,  . We are an education counseling, immigration, and accommodation placement company. We serve international students in Canada and international students destined to come to Canada. No need to have experience in the education field. Basic English, basic computer knowledge, and advanced knowledge in Russian are necessary. This job can be done remotely and it is not required to be in the office. For any details. Please feel free to contact us. Many thanks. Armen Vartanyan. CanBeHome International. {"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::614739edf3ad9e5d6ef4eb70::headhunter_ru", "source": "headhunter_ru", "country": "RU", "company": "CanBeHome International", "position": "Education Consultant", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, полный день

We are an education counseling, immigration, and accommodation placement company.

We serve international students in Canada and international students destined to come to Canada.

No need to have experience in the education field. Basic English, basic computer knowledge, and advanced knowledge in Russian are necessary.

This job can be done remotely and it is not required to be in the office.

For any details; please feel free to contact us.

Many thanks.

Armen Vartanyan

CanBeHome International

Ключевые навыки

Basic Computer Skills
Good Communication Skills
Basic English
"}
